TopicTitle: Possible to make certain objects on pod invisible to the IVA view?

Articles.Content:
Is there a way to make certain objects invisible when in IVA view? I'm nearly finished with an IVA, but part of the pod that matches the IVA can be seen shaking separately when there is a lot of turbulence or jostling. 

The offender:

-Kinda hard to see, but the thin white line at the top of the grey bar is what is bouncing around. It is part of the mesh on the outside (see picture below).

![a9ZmiRc.png](http://i.imgur.com/a9ZmiRc.png)

What it looks like from the outside:

The grey piece along the canopy there is what I'm referring to. The whole frame for the glass is a separate object, so is there a tag or something in Unity that I could apply to it?

![gKsZKmuh.png](http://i.imgur.com/gKsZKmuh.png)
